But the owner of the mine where the disaster occurred is defending its safety record .

Senior Turkish officials , meanwhile , are denying allegations of lax government oversight .
A deputy leader of the ruling party says there are no problems with inspections and supervision of mines and that this mine was vigorously inspected 11 times in the past five years .
Turkey 's energy minister says anyone who 's found to have been negligent about safety at the mine will be punished .
